about_the_game:
Only You Can Save The Future of DOX!

Cat Secretary is a story about sacrifice, family, and how a company’s obsession with infinite growth crippled the morale and productivity of its workforce. It’s also a story about a Cat who becomes a Secretary and solves problems around the office to improve the lives of their coworkers.

So really, there’s something for everyone.


Unravel The Story of a Media Empire
Our hero is a cat with one dream: To become gainfully employed (It’s a tough economy!).

With the help of an eccentric Chief Creative Officer and MouseCorp, a corporation of mice that work within the walls of DOX, Cat Secretary will explore and learn of DOX’s underlying desperation for relevance in the modern age!


Solve Puzzle-Driven Problems at Night
Use your wits and special abilities to undermine DOX’s new automated Night Staff! Investigate your colleagues' desks and learn their problems, then solve them the only way a Cat Secretary would-- with your wits… or your claws! --paws, we mean paws.


Keep Your Day Job
Don’t forget, you still have a job to do! Complete various daily tasks mini-games to stay productive each day, and earn DOXBUX to invest in making yourself even more efficient! You don’t want to be shunned by your colleagues for being unproductive do you?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: Keep your job by day. At night, sneak around the office and solve your colleagues' problems. Who's a good Cat Secretary? You are!
